properties.description: Start testing how to make the risk_object. Starting on PA

transformations.name: FilterCoverage
transformations.description: Filter codetype 122 and Source system Paris

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		iuwaccg as decimal(38,18),
		iuwaddbordrule as decimal(38,18),
		iuwborefl as string,
		iuwbroker as decimal(38,18),
		iuwclabordrule as decimal(38,18),
		iuwclmbordrule as decimal(38,18),
		iuwclobordrule as decimal(38,18),
		iuwcomcod as string,
		iuwcorbordrule as decimal(38,18),
		iuwgrndisc as decimal(38,18),
		iuwinsurer as decimal(38,18),
		iuwinsurerscontact as string,
		iuwinsurerver as string,
		iuwiuvid as string,
		iuwiuwid as string,
		iuwln3 as decimal(38,18),
		iuwnendisc as decimal(38,18),
		iuworate as decimal(38,18),
		iuwoutbusntyp as decimal(38,18),
		iuwpartisip as decimal(38,18),
		iuwpgqid as string,
		iuwprobordrule as decimal(38,18),
		iuwreof as decimal(38,18),
		iuwrescod as decimal(38,18),
		iuwshare as decimal(38,18),
		iuwtrnref as string,
		iuwuwlid as string,
		iuwuwndisc as decimal(38,18)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> iuw
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tcross
source(output(
		iuvcrdate as timestamp,
		iuvcrsign as string,
		iuvicaid as string,
		iuviuvid as string,
		iuviuvver as decimal(38,18),
		iuvuwaid as string,

		iuvvaldate as timestamp,
		iuvverstat as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> iuv

tcross filter(SOURCE_SYSTEM == 'PARIS' && 
CODE_TYPE_ID == 122) ~> FilterCoverage
FilterCoverage select(mapColumn(
		cov_source_code_key = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		cov_target_coede = TARGET_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tcrossCoverage
tcross filter(SOURCE_SYSTEM == 'PARIS' && 
 CODE_TYPE_ID == 113) ~> FilterAgreementType
FilterAgreementType select(mapColumn(
		agt_source_code_key = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		agt_target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		agt_target_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TcrossAgreementType
tcross filter(SOURCE_SYSTEM =='PARIS' && 
  CODE_TYPE_ID == 106) ~> FilterBusinessArea
FilterBusinessArea select(mapColumn(
		bua_source_code_key = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		bua_target_code = TARGET_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TcrossBusinessArea
tcross filter(SOURCE_SYSTEM  =='PARIS' &&  CODE_TYPE_ID  ==124) ~> FilterCurrency
FilterCurrency select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		target_code = TARGET_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TcrossCurrency
tcross filter(SOURCE_SYSTEM == 'PARIS'  
&& CODE_TYPE_ID  == 45) ~> FilterVesselSubType
FilterVesselSubType select(mapColumn(
		sub_type_source_code_key = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		sub_type_target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		sub_type_target_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TcrossVesselSubType
iuw select(mapColumn(
		iuwiuvid,
		iuwoutbusntyp,
		iuwpartisip,
		iuwshare
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> iuwtable
iuv select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
pea select(mapColumn(
		peapeaid,
		peaccode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
